PackageOracle.name: DA_BUS_INTERACT_RELATED
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_BUS_INTERACT_RELATED
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.055627000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,child_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_relationship_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,child_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_relationship_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_bus_interact_related;

body.name: DA_BUS_INTERACT_RELATED
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BUS_INTERACT_RELATED
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.065911000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,child_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_relationship_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_interact_related.add, parms=' || parent_bus_interact_id || '|' || child_bus_interact_id || '|' || bus_interact_relationship_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_bus_interact_related a
(
a.parent_bus_interact_id
,a.child_bus_interact_id
,a.bus_interact_relationship_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.parent_bus_interact_id
,add.child_bus_interact_id
,add.bus_interact_relationship_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_interact_related.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,parent_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,child_bus_interact_id IN NUMBER
,bus_interact_relationship_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_bus_interact_related.del, parms=' || parent_bus_interact_id || '|' || child_bus_interact_id || '|' || bus_interact_relationship_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_bus_interact_related a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.parent_bus_interact_id = del.parent_bus_interact_id
AND a.child_bus_interact_id = del.child_bus_interact_id
AND a.bus_interact_relationship_cd = del.bus_interact_relationship_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_bus_interact_related.del');

END del;

END da_bus_interact_related;
